introduction.heading: Aotearoa Genomic Data Repository
introduction.text: The Aotearoa Genomic Data Repository has been jointly developed by Genomics Aoteoroa and NeSI to provide a secure place for the New Zealand research community to store and share genomic data. Version 1.0 of the repository is up and running, but we are still adding functionality, so you will see ongoing improvements as we implement new features.

login.title: Aotearoa Genomic Data Repository
login.subTitle: Explore and Share Data
login.text: This website is a data repository commissioned by Genomics Aotearoa for New Zealand's genomics researchers to host their high value genome data.
login.contact: Please direct your feedback for the development team at NeSI.
